haw{
    Version{"2.1.27.98"}
    units{
        duration{
            day{
                one{"{0} lā"}
                other{"{0} lā"}
            }
            hour{
                one{"{0} hola"}
                other{"{0} hola"}
            }
            minute{
                one{"{0} minuke"}
                other{"{0} minuke"}
            }
            month{
                one{"{0} mahina"}
                other{"{0} mahina"}
            }
            second{
                one{"{0} kekona"}
                other{"{0} kekona"}
            }
            week{
                one{"{0} pule"}
                other{"{0} pule"}
            }
            year{
                one{"{0} makahiki"}
                other{"{0} makahiki"}
            }
        }
    }
    unitsNarrow{
        temperature{
            celsius{
                one{"{0}°C"}
                other{"{0}°C"}
            }
            fahrenheit{
                one{"{0}°"}
                other{"{0}°"}
            }
        }
    }
}
